text: Redbook is an American women's magazine. It is published by the Hearst magazine division. It was first published in May 1903 as The Red Book Illustrated by Stumer, Rosenthal and Eckstein, a firm of Chicago retail merchants. It is one of the "Seven Sisters", a group of women's service magazines. It ceased print publication after January 2019 and now operates exclusively online. Category:American women's magazines Category:Monthly magazines Category:Fashion magazines
title: Redbook
